hero.title: Yakha I-SaaS Yakho
hero.subtitle: Ngokushesha Okunye
hero.description: Isandla sika-Nextji esisebenzayo kunokuqala ngokuseshwa, ukuhlanganiswa, kanye nesakhiwo esihle.

meta.title: Nge Thina
meta.description: Funda kwabuye ukwazi ngochwepheshe bakhe namisiya ethu

about.title: Nge Thina
about.intro: Sakha usuku lwobuchwepheshe bemali, ukuze ukuphathwa kwekhredithi kube lula futhi kuvulelekile kuwonke.

mission.title: Umisiya Wethu
mission.description: Ukuze kuqondiswe ukuphathwa kwezimali ngokunikeza izinsiza ezilula ezisiza amabhizinisi nabantu ukuziphatha kahle ikhredithi yabo.

vision.title: Ubuwembu Bethu
vision.description: Umhlaba apho ukuwazi ukubala nokuphatha ikhredithi kuwuvulelekile wonke, osizwa ubuchwepheshe namazwi.

values.title: Izikhungo Zethu
items: Indlela yokugcina abathengi kuqala ekulungiseneni izinkinga

features.title: Konke Okudingekayo
features.subtitle: Izici ezihlanganisiwe ukuze uphucule ukuthuthuka kwakho

i18n.title: Ukuhlanganiswa Kwamazwe
i18n.description: Ukuxhasanisa ngolwimi nge-next-intl, ukuhlanganiswa okuhle i-SEO ukuze ufinyelele emhlabeni jikelele.

design.title: Isakhiwo Esihle
design.description: Umxholo wekhompuyutha oqondiswe ngamaphephandlu esemzimwenini netekhnoloji ephumelelayo.

performance.title: UkuSebenza Okulungisiwe
performance.description: Sakhiwe inguqulo ye-Nextji 14 App Router ngezingxenye zeseva nokuqhuba okuqhakazela.

typescript.title: I-Thayipaskript Kuqala
typescript.description: Ikhowudi eliphelele elichazwe ukuze kube nomuzamo omsulwa omphelele kumprogrammer kanye nephutha ezimbalwa.

general.title: I-SaaS Boilerplate - Yakha Ngokushesha
general.description: Isandla sika-Nextji esisebenzayo kunokuqala ngokuseshwa nokuhlanganiswa kwamazwe kanye nesakhiwo esihle

fintech.title: I-FinTech SaaS Boilerplate - Qalisisa Umkhiqizo Wakho Wemali
fintech.description: Isandla sika-Nextji esisebenzayo kunokuqala ngokuseshwa esihlanganisiwe ukusetshenziswa kwezinhlelo zobuchwepheshe bemali
